title: Teammates for CLASH mode
body:
Hello. looking for 4 more members for a team to enter clash looking at 4-6 members as i do want subs as well 
Currently look for:
Top laner:
Mid laner 
Bot lane ( Carry and support) :
Jungler:

2-3 Subs: 

Im a Jungle/top main myself but i can also play other roles if need be. add me in game IGN: Fireball for try outs

Looking for players between silver 5 and silver 1{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body: Still have spots open, i main sup silver 3

Hey Fireball.
Im looking for a team my self, i have only played placements on my newest account and started in silver 5. have not played many ranked games after, but i would think i am around low to high gold. u can add me or write to me if u need more info. thx
I main mid mostly and top if needed btw ^^
Hey man, do you play on the oce server? or EUW?
Ah that sucks, im on oce or else i'd love you to join. {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Dang :/ hope u find a team buddy ^^
Same to you man, and best of luck on the rift Friday. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
